  group_by(question_id, question) %>%
  summarise(majority_option = first(option),

# ===== 4) Theme ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô =====

          axis.text = element_text(size = 16),
          plot.title.position = "plot",
          axis.title.x = element_blank())
)

# ===== 5) ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡πÅ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠ =====
plot_item <- function(qid) {
  dat <- responses_df %>%
    filter(question_id == qid) %>%
    mutate(option = fct_reorder(option, responses))   # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô

  ymax <- max(dat$responses) * 1.25

  ggplot(dat, aes(x = option, y = responses)) +
    geom_col() +
    # label ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏á
    geom_text(aes(label = responses, y = responses/2),
              color = "white", size = 4, hjust = 0, vjust = 0.5) +
    coord_flip(ylim = c(0, ymax)) +
    labs(title = paste0(dat$question_id[1], ": ", dat$question[1]),
         y = "‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö", x = NULL)
}

# ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô: ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á 5 ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠
